docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 5 (AP) --The Treasury reported today that sales of gold to Britain during the third quarter of this year totaled $76.6-million, largely reflecting the rush on gold following the Middle East crisis last June.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 5 (AP) --The Treasury reported today that sales of gold to Britain during the third quarter of this year totaled $76.6-million, largely reflecting the rush on gold following the Middle East crisis last June.
docs.abstract: US Treas repts $76.6-million in gold sold to GB in 3d qr

headline.main: $76-Million in Gold Bought by Britain In U.S. in 3d Period; $76-MILLION GOLD IS SOLD TO BRITAIN

docs.snippet: Oscar Gestido reluctantly and belatedly undertook drastic measures to haul democratic Uruguay back from bankruptcy and chaos. It is tragic that death has removed him at 66 before this necessary program could show results to a skeptical country.
docs.lead_paragraph: Oscar Gestido reluctantly and belatedly undertook drastic measures to haul democratic Uruguay back from bankruptcy and chaos. It is tragic that death has removed him at 66 before this necessary program could show results to a skeptical country.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 6 (AP)--Gen. Oscar Daniel Gestido died today of a heart attack after just nine months as President of his economically troubled little nation. He was 66 years old.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 6 (AP)--Gen. Oscar Daniel Gestido died today of a heart attack after just nine months as President of his economically troubled little nation. He was 66 years old.

headline.main: President Gestido of Uruguay Is Dead; Hard Work His Recipe Sought to Fight Minister

docs.snippet: WHETHER or not any records are set in the  athletic contests next year in Mexico City, the Organizing Committee of the Games of the XIX Olympiad has set out to establish a new character for the event.
docs.lead_paragraph: WHETHER or not any records are set in the athletic contests next year in Mexico City, the Organizing Committee of the Games of the XIX Olympiad has set out to establish a new character for the event.
docs.abstract: J Canaday on internatl scope of cultural events which will coincide with '68 Olympic Games, Mex City; notes medals will be presented on basis of participation but not on ranking in events; cites some events and participants

headline.main: Art: Culture Gets High Billing at Olympics in Mexico; 'Games' Also Means an Exchange of Ideas
